name: Hinomaru Stake Pool
description: NFT愛好家で元警察官のシステムエンジニアが運営。カルダノを中心にNFT関連の情報発信をしています。「日本」からカルダノの分散化に貢献し、永く堅実なプール運営を目指します。Operated by a system engineer who is an NFT enthusiast and former police officer.I am providing information and experiences related to NFT with a focus on Cardano.I contribute to the decentralization of Cardano from Japan and aim to operate the pool in a long and solid way.
